title: Tech Mahindra to hire 6,000 freshers in FY25
description: Total headcount for Tech Mahindra declined by 795 from the previous quarter to 145,455, and falling by 6,945 from 152,400 employees a year ago.
content: Tech Mahindra, country's fifth largest IT services firm, is set to hire 1,500 freshers every quarter as it sees turnaround in business from the first quarter of fiscal year 2024-25 starting April, its top executive said.“We are steadily hiring fresh graduates with 1500 every quarter and that continues,” said Mohit Joshi, managing director & chief executive officer, Tech Mahindra.Total headcount for Tech Mahindra declined by 795 from the previous quarter to 145,455, and falling by 6,945 from 152,400 employees a year ago.Headcount reduction reflects the business volume that we are seeing, Joshi said adding that he sees improvement going forward.Top-tier IT majors TCS, Infosys and Wipro which have announced a cumulative headcount dip of 63,759 employees in FY24.
